The City of Converse
--------------------

Welcome to the City of Converse, where we connect community with commerce.Â  It's our mission to ensure the health, safety, and welfare of our community, while implementing and maintaining cost efficiency by providing unparalleled service and enhancing the quality of life for the Citizens of Converse.
